reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be a perfect black dress with great material quality and thickness that isn't see-through. The dress fits well, with one customer noting it hits about 2 inches above the knee, and customers find it flattering, with one mentioning it hugs the body perfectly. While some customers appreciate the length, others find it too short. The dress receives mixed feedback about sizing, with several customers noting it's not true to the size chart. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little black dress for the holidays!
items.body: This is the perfect little black dress! Super flattering and the length was perfect for me. I’m 5 foot five and have pretty short legs and I feel like it hit at my mid thigh perfect. Extremely comfortable and I was still able to wear a strapless bra even with the low back, which I was worried about. I initially ordered an extra large however it was too big in the arm and chest area so returned for a large for a more snug fit, it was perfect! Read more
items.author: Chelsey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little Black Dress
items.body: This dress is the perfect LBD. Fits as expected and very flattering. Read more
items.author: Mandi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection!
items.body: Great value! Thick, somewhat stretchy material hugs and slims curves. Comfortable to wear. Shape is as expected, with the flair in the skirt. Color is as expected - a soft, baby pink. This dress impressed me! Super cute and flattering. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nah
items.body: Not worth it to me. Sent it back same day. Cheaply made Read more
items.author: Haus of Bulliez LLC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress!
items.body: this dress is so pretty on. It is a comfortable material and does have a stretch to it. Although I will say, if you are more busty than the line design on the dress, probably won’t be in the correct position that it should be. I kept having to pull the dress down to be able to get the line in the right spot because I wore it for engagement pictures. I loved the scoop back on this dress as well, it was so flattering. Read more
items.author: Brooke Detillier

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Comfortable!
items.body: Love this dress! The quality of the material is great it’s thick and soft. It’s flattering, comfortable, and simple. I took my graduation photos in this dress. Read more
items.author: Marcela

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Casual/business/dressed up
items.body: Dress is ok. I like that you can wear it casual, to a business event & dress it up to look youthful. Was I super impressed ? Na. I weigh 150, and had a baby. Might need to wear shapewear to smooth my lower tummy. Fabric feels comfortable. Not see through, as I wore no bra Strap sit right near underarms. **sorry pics are not ideal- just tried it on & had partner take the photos Read more
items.author: Yasmeen Solano

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing!
items.body: absolutely gorgeous!! such a cute & classy look! Read more
items.author: Laura Peters

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Pink, White, Light Green, Black, Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
